episodes.title: Is MAGA a cult?
episodes.description:
Is MAGA a movement — or a mindset? 
In this episode of Off the Couch with Dr. Greg, psychologist Dr. Greg Cason takes a deep dive into the psychology of political devotion. We’re not talking about politics — we’re talking about how belief becomes identity. 
From blind loyalty to charismatic leadership, we’ll explore what happens when political passion crosses the line into psychological captivity. 
What makes some movements mirror cult dynamics? Why do intelligent, well-meaning people surrender critical thinking for belonging and certainty? And most importantly — could any of us be doing the same thing without realizing it? 
You’ll learn: 
The 6 classic traits that define cult-like dynamics 
Why belonging feels safer than questioning 
How cognitive dissonance keeps followers loyal 
Why outrage feels addictive — and how to break free 

This episode isn’t about sides — it’s about psychology, power, and the human need to believe. 
Whether it’s MAGA, QAnon, or any cause that replaces thought with faith, the danger isn’t the cause — it’s the captivity of the mind. 
Freedom starts when you can ask your own questions again.
